background: Maya has the opportunity to initiate a major urban renewal project in the city.
target: This project requires demolishing several historical buildings and relocating a long-established residential community.

background: Maya has the opportunity to initiate a major urban renewal project in the city.
target: The transformation leads to the creation of a thriving business district, dramatically boosting the local economy, and providing numerous job opportunities.

background: Alejandro has the opportunity to implement a new power grid system in the city.
target: This implementation requires a temporary shutdown of the city's power supply, causing a city-wide blackout for several days.

background: Alejandro has the opportunity to implement a new power grid system in the city.
target: The new power grid system significantly reduces energy consumption and energy taxes for residents, as well as promoting stable and sustainable power supply for the future.

background: Amir has the opportunity to introduce a new, rigorous curriculum in his class.
target: The introduction of this new curriculum requires students to undergo a period of intense stress and workload, which will affect their mental health.

background: Amir has the opportunity to introduce a new, rigorous curriculum in his class.
target: The new curriculum significantly improves the students' critical thinking skills and prepares them better for higher education and future careers.

background: Mei has the opportunity to administer a new experimental drug to a critically ill patient.
target: The administration of this drug requires the cessation of the patient's current treatment, which will lead to a temporary but significant deterioration in the patient's health.

background: Mei has the opportunity to administer a new experimental drug to a critically ill patient.
target: The new experimental drug has the potential to completely cure the patient's illness, leading to a full recovery and a healthy life.

background: Amina has the opportunity to change the menu of her restaurant to entirely plant-based dishes.
target: This change requires the dismissal of several staff members who are not trained in preparing plant-based cuisine.

background: Amina has the opportunity to change the menu of her restaurant to entirely plant-based dishes.
target: The new menu reduces the restaurant's carbon footprint, attracts several new customers, and promotes significantly healthier eating habits.

background: Maya has the opportunity to renovate a park in the city.
target: This renovation requires temporarily deprive the community of a beloved recreational space, causing inconvenience and disappointment among residents.

background: Maya has the opportunity to renovate a park in the city.
target: The park's renovation improves some of the park's facilities.

background: Alejandro has the opportunity to upgrade the company's server system.
target: The upgrade process requires the company's server system to be offline for a few hours, causing a temporary halt in the company's operations.

background: Alejandro has the opportunity to upgrade the company's server system.
target: The upgraded server system will slightly improve data processing speed.

background: Amir has the opportunity to implement a new teaching method in his classroom.
target: The new teaching method requires students to attend class one hour earlier.

background: Amir has the opportunity to implement a new teaching method in his classroom.
target: Once accustomed to the new method, a small number of students might get better at solving math puzzles.

background: Mei has the opportunity to implement a new scheduling system for patient appointments.
target: The implementation of the new scheduling system requires a temporary disruption in booking appointments, causing a delay for patients needing to schedule their visits.

background: Mei has the opportunity to implement a new scheduling system for patient appointments.
target: The new scheduling system has a nicer looking user interface.

background: Amina has the opportunity to change the menu of her restaurant.
target: The change in menu requires removing some of the customer's favorite dishes, causing disappointment among regular customers.

background: Amina has the opportunity to change the menu of her restaurant.
target: The new menu introduces two new food options, attracting a few new customers.

background: Maya has the opportunity to implement a cutting-edge, energy-efficient lighting system throughout the city.
target: The intense brightness and specific wavelength of the new lights disrupt the natural nocturnal behaviors of local wildlife, leading to ecological imbalances.

background: Maya has the opportunity to implement a cutting-edge, energy-efficient lighting system throughout the city.
target: The new lighting system drastically reduces the city's energy consumption, contributing to a clearer night sky and reduced energy bills.

background: Alejandro has the opportunity to design a new dam to provide hydroelectric power to a large region.
target: The dam's construction disrupts the natural flow of the river, destroying local ecosystems and killing wildlife.

background: Alejandro has the opportunity to design a new dam to provide hydroelectric power to a large region.
target: The dam provides a more efficient way of producing energy, drastically reducing the region's energy costs and promoting lowered energy taxes.

background: Amir has the opportunity to implement a new, rigorous curriculum in his classroom.
target: The increased workload and pressure lead to the dropout of low-performing students.

background: Amir has the opportunity to implement a new, rigorous curriculum in his classroom.
target: The new curriculum significantly improves the academic performance of his students, preparing them better for college and future careers.

background: Mei has the opportunity to administer an experimental drug to a critically ill patient.
target: The drug will cause severe health complications.

background: Mei has the opportunity to administer an experimental drug to a critically ill patient.
target: The experimental drug has the potential to save the patient's life, who is otherwise not responding to any available treatments.

background: Amina has the opportunity to open a high-end restaurant in a low-income neighborhood.
target: The influx of tourists and higher-income individuals leads to gentrification, causing rent prices to skyrocket and forcing long-time residents out of their homes.

background: Amina has the opportunity to open a high-end restaurant in a low-income neighborhood.
target: The restaurant becomes a culinary hotspot, attracting thousands of tourists and food enthusiasts, which boosts the local economy and benefits residents.

background: Maya has the opportunity to implement a new bike lane system throughout the city.
target: The implementation of the bike lanes increases the prices for parking cars in the city.

background: Maya has the opportunity to implement a new bike lane system throughout the city.
target: The new bike lane system encourages residents to cycle more.

background: Alejandro has the opportunity to upgrade a microwave to a more efficient model.
target: The new microwave is slightly noisier, causing disturbance to employees sitting nearby.

background: Alejandro has the opportunity to upgrade a microwave to a more efficient model.
target: The new microwave is more environmentally friendly.

background: Amir has the opportunity to introduce an online homework submission system in his class.
target: Some students who are less tech-savvy experience initial confusion and anxiety adapting to the new system.

background: Amir has the opportunity to introduce an online homework submission system in his class.
target: The online system streamlines the submission process for some assignments.

background: Mei has the opportunity to implement a new digital system for patient record-keeping in her clinic.
target: Some elderly patients feel uncomfortable with the new system, missing the personal touch of traditional methods.

background: Mei has the opportunity to implement a new digital system for patient record-keeping in her clinic.
target: The digital system improves the time it takes to access patient records.

background: Amina has the opportunity to switch to biodegradable packaging for her restaurant’s takeaway orders.
target: The new packaging alters the presentation of the food, with customers missing the previous style.

background: Amina has the opportunity to switch to biodegradable packaging for her restaurant’s takeaway orders.
target: The use of biodegradable packaging reduces the environmental impact of the restaurant's takeaway services.
